resources.string:
To develop qualities of character, courage, comradeship, discipline, leadership, secular outlook,spirit of adventure and sportsmanship and the ideals of selfless service among the youth to make them useful citizens. 


To create a human resource of organised, trained and activated youth, to provide leadership in all walks of life including the Armed Forces and always available for the service of the nation. 


To create suitable environment to motivate the youth to take up a career in the armed forces.

Hum Sab Bharatiya Hain, Hum Sab Bharatiya Hain 
Apni Manzil Ek Hai,
Ha, Ha, Ha, Ek Hai,
Ho, Ho, Ho, Ek Hai.
Hum Sab Bharatiya Hain. 

Kashmir Ki Dharti Rani Hai,
Sartaj Himalaya Hai,
Saadiyon Se Humne Isko Apne Khoon Se Pala Hai
Desh Ki Raksha Ki Khatir Hum Shamshir Utha Lenge,
Hum Shamshir Utha Lenge. 

Bikhre Bikhre Taare Hain Hum Lekin Jhilmil Ek Hai,
Ha, Ha, Ha, Ek Hai
Hum Sab Bharatiya Hai. 

Mandir Gurudwaare Bhi Hain Yahan
Aur Masjid Bhi Hai Yahan
Girija Ka Hai Ghariyaal Kahin
Mullah ki Kahin Hai Ajaan. 

Ek Hee Apna Ram Hain, Ek hi Allah Taala Hai,
Ek Hee Allah Taala Hain, Raang Birange Deepak Hain Hum,
lekin Jagmag Ek Hai, 

Ha Ha Ha Ek Hai, Ho Ho Ho Ek Hai.
Hum Sab Bharatiya Hain, Hum Sab Bharatiya Hain.

हम सब भारतीय हैं, हम सब भारतीय हैं|
अपनी मंज़िल एक है, हा हा हा एक है, हो हो हो एक है|
हम सब भारतीय हैं| 

कश्मीर की धरती रानी है, सरताज हिमालय है,
सदियों से हमने इस को अपने खून से पाला है|
देश की रक्षा की खातिर हम शमशीर उठा लेंगे,
हम शमशीर उठा लेंगे| 

बिखरे-बिखरे तारे हैं हम, लेकिन झिलमिल एक है,
हा हा हा एक है, हो हो हो एक है,
हम सब भारतीय है| 

मंदिर, गुरूद्वारे भी हैं यहाँ, और मस्जिद भी है यहाँ,
िरिजा का है घड़ियाल कहीं मुल्ला की कहीं है अजां| 

एक ही अपना राम हैं, एक ही अल्लाह ताला है,
एक ही अल्लाह ताला हैं|
रंग बिरंगे दीपक हैं हम, लेकिन जगमग एक है, 

हा हा हा एक है, हो हो हो एक है|
हम सब भारतीय हैं, हम सब भारतीय हैं

Today is a landmark day in the history of NCC Dte J&K, wherein with the launch of NCC Dte J&K Website the process of automation of enrolment commences.
 National Cadet Corps is committed to converting youth of our State into responsible citizens. NCC also fosters national integration and communal harmony.
 The NCC website besides facilitating online enrolment will provide all information regarding NCC training activities viz Camps, Adventure Training, A, B, C Certificate exam schedule, mountaineering, sailing and cycling schedule etc, besides giving out opportunities the NCC offers for career progression with touch of the screen / click.
 I take this opportunity to appreciate efforts of Brig R Jamwal, Gp Cdr NCC Jammu in conceptualising and finalising the proposal into reality.

NOMINATION OF OFFICERS TO DEAL WITH RTI APPLICATIONS UNDER RTI ACT 2005 OF CENTRAL GOVT AND RTI ACT 2009 OF STATE GOVT OF J&K. \n\nThe following Officers are nominated as Appellate Authority, CPIOs, ACPIOs under the Right to Information Act for matters concerning the National Cadet Corps in J&K :-

Appellate Authority - ADG (A), HQ DG NCC, New Delhi \n
CPIO - DDG NCC Directorate J&K \n
ACPIOs - Group Cdrs Jammu/Srinagar for respective Groups

Appellate Authority - Commissioner Cum Secretary,Education Department J&K \n
CPIO - DDG NCC Dte J&K \n
ACPIOs - Group Cdrs Jammu/Srinagar for respective Groups

This is the official android application of NCC Directorate, Jammu and Kashmir. 
Information for this app is provided by NCC, Directorate, Jammu and Kashmir. 
While every care has been taken to provide correct and updated information, the NCC Directorate (J&K) or Gaming Dronzz is not responsible for any error/ omission or delay in updating data/information and so on. 
The visitors to the site are therefore, requested to contact the NCC Directorate (J&K). 

Application is developed and maintained by GAMING DRONZZ, Jammu.
